text: Rhodope may refer to: * Rhodope (mythology), a figure of Greek mythology * Rhodope Mountains, in Bulgaria and Greece * Rhodope (regional unit), of Greece * Rhodope (province), a Roman and Byzantine province * 166 Rhodope, an asteroid * Rhodope (genus), a genus of the family Rhodopidae, order Rhodopemorpha, class Gastropoda * Mylothris rhodope, a dotted border butterfly of tropical Africa commonly known as the Rhodope
title: Rhodope
